text: Lars Stefan Sundelin (8 February 1936 – 18 January 2003) was a Swedish sailor. He was a cousin of the brothers Jörgen, Peter and Ulf Sundelin who competed as a team at the 1968 and 1972 Olympics and at the world championships in between. At the 1976 Summer Olympics Ulf was replaced by Stefan, and the Sundelin team finished ninth in the three-person keelboat event. == References == Category:1936 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Sailors at the 1976 Summer Olympics – Soling Category:Olympic sailors of Sweden Category:Swedish male sailors (sport)
title: Stefan Sundelin
